body.prompt:
Generate a fake conversation between a customer and an agent.
The agent should introduce themselves, their company and give the customer
their name. The agent should ask for the customer's name.
As part of the conversation, have the agent ask for two pieces of
personal information.  Spell out numbers. For example, 1000 should be
said as one zero zero zero, not one thousand. The conversation should be
at least 10 lines long and be complete. At the end
of the conversation, the agent should thank the customer for their time
and end the conversation. Return the conversation formatted 
like the following example:

{'conversation': 
    [
    {'speaker': 'Agent', 'message': 'xxxxx'}, 
    {'speaker': 'Customer', 'message': "xxxxx."}, 
    {'speaker': 'Agent', 'message': "xxxxxx"}
    ] 
}

body.speaker: Agent
body.message: Hello! My name is Louis Martin and I am a customer service agent at Bright Hotels. May I know your name, please?

body.speaker: Customer
body.message: Hello Louis, my name is Lauren Hayes.

body.speaker: Agent
body.message: Nice to meet you, Lauren. Before we proceed, may I ask for your room number and the date of your stay at our hotel?

body.speaker: Customer
body.message: My room number is two two zero one and I stayed at your hotel on the twenty seventh of November.

body.speaker: Agent
body.message: Thank you for providing that information. To better assist you, could you also confirm your contact number and email address with us?

body.speaker: Customer
body.message: Sure, my contact number is five five five, two three four, eight nine one zero, and my email address is lauren.hayes@email.com.

body.speaker: Agent
body.message: Great! Thank you for the details, Lauren. We will investigate your concerns regarding the cleanliness issue during your stay.

body.speaker: Agent
body.message: Thank you for bringing this to our attention, Lauren. We will work to ensure a better experience for you in the future. Have a great day!

body.speaker: Agent
body.message: Thank you for your time. Goodbye!
